titles.title: Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act
Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act
Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act
Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Corning National Fish Hatchery to the State of Arkansas.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife and Oceans.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior.
Subcommittee Hearings Held.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-34.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 16.

action.text: Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 144 Reported to House. Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 535 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.
Rule H. Res. 144 passed House.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 144.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 535 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.
House resolved itself into the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union pursuant to H. Res. 144 and Rule XXIII.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Dave Camp to act as Chairman of the Committee.
GENERAL DEBATE - The Committee of the Whole proceeded with one hour of general debate.
The House rose from the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union to report H.R. 535.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.
The House adopted the amendment as agreed to by the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. With written report No. 104-130.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 174.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/7/1995--Passed House amended. Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Arkansas, without reimbursement, the Corning National Fish Hatchery (popularly known as the William H. Donham State Fish Hatchery) near Corning, Arkansas.
